Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_HWND

The function AIL_HWND returns the HWND that MSS has detected as your primary HWND.

HWND AIL_HWND();

Discussion

You can change the HWND with by calling AIL_set_DirectSound_HWND before AIL_open_digital_driver.


Group: 2D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_open_digital_driver, AIL_set_DirectSound_HWND
Related Basic Types: HWND
